name: Bullet Bunny (zeeka)
description:
Bullet Bunny is the first game ever released by zeeka. The game is a small top down bullet hell shooter, 

        Shoot - Left Moue Click

            Press Space to Dash

                 W - walk up

                  S - walk down

                  A - walk left

                  D - walk right

This game would not be possible without the help of Blackthornprod & Liam, their  tutorial videos helped me develop and release my first game.
